PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.INTRO: Zain Tawseel ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website.

INFO_COLLECT.TITLE: Information We Collect
INFO_COLLECT.DESCRIPTION: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect on the Site includes:

PERSONAL_DATA.TITLE: Personal Data
PERSONAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION: Name, email address, and phone number, if voluntarily provided.

USAGE_DATA.TITLE: Usage Data
USAGE_DATA.DESCRIPTION: IP address, browser type, and pages visited.

INFO_USE.TITLE: Use of Your Information
INFO_USE.DESCRIPTION: We use the information we collect to:

ITEMS.ITEM2: Improve your experience on the website

DISCLOSURE.TITLE: Disclosure of Your Information
DISCLOSURE.DESCRIPTION: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your information to outside parties unless required by law or for service provision.

SECURITY.TITLE: Security
SECURITY.DESCRIPTION: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information but cannot guarantee absolute security.

RIGHTS.TITLE: Your Rights
RIGHTS.DESCRIPTION: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Contact us if you wish to exercise these rights.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

TERMS_CONDITIONS.TITLE: Terms & Conditions
TERMS_CONDITIONS.WELCOME: Welcome to Zain Tawseel! These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Zain Tawseel's Website, located at https://zain-tawseel.com.
TERMS_CONDITIONS.ACCEPTANCE: By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use Zain Tawseel if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.

COOKIES.TITLE: Cookies
COOKIES.DESCRIPTION: We employ the use of cookies. By accessing Zain Tawseel, you agreed to use cookies in agreement with the Zain Tawseel's Privacy Policy.

LICENSE.TITLE: License
LICENSE.DESCRIPTION: Unless otherwise stated, Zain Tawseel and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on Zain Tawseel. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from Zain Tawseel for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.

RESTRICTIONS.ITEM2: Sell, rent or sub-license material from Zain Tawseel
RESTRICTIONS.ITEM3: Reproduce, duplicate or copy material from Zain Tawseel

COMMENTS.TITLE: User Comments
COMMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information. Zain Tawseel does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of Zain Tawseel, its agents and/or affiliates.

HYPERLINKING.TITLE: Hyperlinking to our Content
HYPERLINKING.DESCRIPTION: The following organizations may link to our Website without prior written approval:
HYPERLINKING.ITEM4: Online directory distributors may link to our Website in the same manner as they hyperlink to the Websites of other listed businesses;
HYPERLINKING.ITEM5: System wide Accredited Businesses except soliciting non-profit organizations, charity shopping malls, and charity fundraising groups which may not hyperlink to our Web site.

ABOUT_US.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT_US.PARAGRAPH_1: Zain Tawseel is an application owned by Kuwait Star for General Trading and Contracting, launched in September 2015 after identifying the lack in the market to simplify the purchasing process for customers.
ABOUT_US.PARAGRAPH_2: Over the past ten years, we have served more than 150,000 customers across Kuwait, Qatar, and Saudi Arabia, thanks to our commitment to delivering reliable and fast service.
ABOUT_US.PARAGRAPH_3: Today, we offer over 150 diverse digital products, meeting various customer needs with a wide range of options to choose from.
ABOUT_US.PARAGRAPH_4: Once the payment is completed, the digital card is delivered directly in the app, with no delays or additional steps.
ABOUT_US.PARAGRAPH_5: The application is officially licensed by the Ministry of Commerce and Industry in Kuwait, and we are committed to the highest standards of security and transparency in all our operations.
ABOUT_US.PARAGRAPH_6: Our customer support team is available 24/7 to assist users and respond to any inquiries at any time.

PAYMENT.DESCRIPTION: Offers a variety of safe and convenient payment methods that suit all your needs, without waiting or complications.

OFFERS.DESCRIPTION: Always has the best deals that fit your needs perfectly and save you money! Don't miss out on our amazing offers!

SPEED.TITLE: High speed!
SPEED.DESCRIPTION: Once you complete the purchase process, the cards will be received on your email quickly and securely!
